bill_title: revise certain provisions related to special assessments.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions related to special assessments. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 5-14-20 be amended to read: 5-14-20. A special assessment or interest and penalties which affects and is assessed against property of the Department of Game, Fish and Parks or the Department of Transportation shall be paid from money available to the respective department which has property affected. In all other cases special assessments or interest and penalties thereon shall be paid by the Bureau of Administration from money appropriated for the purpose with the exception of those projects which incur a special assessment equal to or greater than twenty thousand dollars. Those projects shall be approved by the Bureau of Administration and then shall be presented in the regular annual budget process by the respective department, agency, board, or commission which has property affected. In each fiscal year, the sum of no more than eighty thousand dollars, or so much thereof as may be necessary, is annually appropriated from the general fund to meet shall be used for those assessments, interest, and penalties which are less than twenty thousand dollars. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
